investigatorQuestion.text: One last question. Did you kill them?

maskAnswers.playerLine: No. I have provided evidence and alibis that prove my innocence. The facts speak for themselves.

lowTension.text: Cold to the end. No emotion at all.
Facts can be fabricated. Emotions are harder to fake.
That robotic response tells me everything.

highTension.text: Your evidence is compelling. I'll review it.
Fair enough. The facts will determine the outcome.
Logical approach. We'll see what holds up.

maskAnswers.playerLine: No! How could you even ask me that? They were my friend! I would never... I could never hurt them.

lowTension.text: Convincing performance. But I've seen better.
Those tears won't save you now.
Everyone says that. Not everyone means it.

highTension.text: I had to ask. It's my job.
Your reaction seems genuine. I'll note that.
I believe you. But the investigation continues.

maskAnswers.playerLine: Absolutely not! And I'm done with these accusations! Either charge me or let me go!

lowTension.text: Only guilty people demand to leave mid-interrogation.
Oh, we'll be charging you alright.

highTension.text: I understand your frustration. We're almost done.
Your patience is noted. Just one more moment.

maskAnswers.playerLine: Detective, after everything we've discussed, do you really think I'm capable of that? You know me better by now.

lowTension.text: I don't know you at all. That's the problem.
Killers often seem the most charming.
Nice try. But charm doesn't equal innocence.

highTension.text: You've made a good impression. But impressions aren't evidence.
I'm forming my opinion. Let the evidence speak.
We'll see. Thank you for your cooperation.
